languages.text: "Обитатели системы Райкад, Гордости Сантиэля и других миров, лишившихся звезд... Это ты вынес им приговор, указав друкари на их светила".
"The denizens of the Rykad System, Santiel's Pride, and all the other starless worlds... You were the one who sentenced them to death by sending the Drukhari after their suns."
languages.original_text: "Обитатели системы Райкад, Гордости Сантиэля и других миров, лишившихся звезд... Это ты вынес им приговор, указав друкари на их светила".

traits.locale_text: "The denizens of the Rykad System, Santiel's Pride, and all the other starless worlds... You were the one who sentenced them to ruin by sending the Drukhari after their suns."
"The denizens of the Rykad System, Santiel's Pride, and all the other starless worlds... You were the one who sentenced them to ruin by sending the Drukhari after their suns."
"The denizens of the Rykad System, Santiel's Pride, and all the other starless worlds... You were the one who sentenced them to death by sending the Drukhari after their suns."
"The denizens of the Rykad System, Santiel's Pride, and all the other starless worlds... You were the one who sentenced them to death by sending the Drukhari after their suns."
"The denizens of the Rykad System, Santiel's Pride, and all the other starless worlds... You were the one who sentenced them to death by sending the Drukhari after their suns."

languages.text: 「ライカド星系、サンティエル・プライド、そしてその他の星なき世界の住民たち…彼らの太陽を求めてデュカーリを送り込み、死を宣告したのはお前だ」
languages.original_text: "The denizens of the Rykad System, Santiel's Pride, and all the other starless worlds... You were the one who sentenced them to death by sending the Drukhari after their suns."

traits.locale_text: 「ライカド星系、サンティエル・プライド、そしてその他の星なき世界の住民たち…彼らの太陽を求めてデュカーリを送り込み、死を宣告したのはお前だ」

languages.text: “莱卡德星系、桑提尔之傲，还有其他那些被盗走恒星的世界……是你派遣黑暗灵族盗走了他们的恒星，判了他们死刑。”
languages.original_text: "The denizens of the Rykad System, Santiel's Pride, and all the other starless worlds... You were the one who sentenced them to death by sending the Drukhari after their suns."

traits.locale_text: “莱卡德星系、桑提尔之傲，还有其他那些被盗走恒星的世界……是你派遣黑暗灵族盗走了他们的恒星，判了他们死刑。”

languages.text: « Les peuples du système de Rykad, de la Gloire de Santiel et de tous les autres mondes sans étoile... C'est vous qui les avez condamnés en envoyant les Drukharis voler leurs soleils. »
languages.original_text: "The denizens of the Rykad System, Santiel's Pride, and all the other starless worlds... You were the one who sentenced them to death by sending the Drukhari after their suns."

traits.locale_text: « Les peuples du système de Rykad, de la Gloire de Santiel et de tous les autres mondes sans étoile... C'est vous qui les avez condamnés en envoyant les Drukharis voler leurs soleils. »

languages.text: «Los habitantes de Rykad, Orgullo de Santiel y todos los otros sistemas sin estrella... Fue usted quien los condenó a muerte, enviando a los Drukhari a por sus soles».
languages.original_text: "The denizens of the Rykad System, Santiel's Pride, and all the other starless worlds... You were the one who sentenced them to death by sending the Drukhari after their suns."

traits.locale_text: «Los habitantes de Rykad, Orgullo de Santiel y todos los otros sistemas sin estrella... Fue usted quien los condenó a muerte, enviando a los Drukhari a por sus soles».

languages.text: "Die Bewohner des Rykad-Systems, Santiels Stolz, und all die anderen sternlosen Welten ... Ihr wart es, die sie zum Tode verurteilten, indem ihr den Drukhari Eure Sonnen ausgeliefert habt."
languages.original_text: "The denizens of the Rykad System, Santiel's Pride, and all the other starless worlds... You were the one who sentenced them to death by sending the Drukhari after their suns."

traits.locale_text: "Die Bewohner des Rykad-Systems, Santiels Stolz, und all die anderen sternlosen Welten ... Ihr wart es, die sie zum Tode verurteilten, indem ihr den Drukhari Eure Sonnen ausgeliefert habt."

languages.text: "Rykad Sistemi, Santiel'in Gururu ve diğer tüm yıldızsız dünyaların halkları... Drukharileri güneşlerin peşine göndererek hepsini sen ölüme mahkûm ettin."
languages.original_text: "The denizens of the Rykad System, Santiel's Pride, and all the other starless worlds... You were the one who sentenced them to death by sending the Drukhari after their suns."
